column1: 56.  When this Court inquired from the Respondent whether the monies obtained from the

but discussed at length in NSW Sol [4145: Complainant were kept in a trust account, the Respondent appeared perplexed by the
term ‘trust account’ itself. Upon being questioned further, he admitted that the monies
were deposited into his own account and that he did not keep proper records of them.
It  is  clear  that  the  Respondent  has  not  only  committed  the  error  of  commingling  the
Complainant’s monies with his own,17 but he has also failed to keep any records of it.
